scripts.scriptdata:
Section "Files" EndSection
### Default Monitor: autoprobe everything
Section "Monitor" Identifier "Standardmonitor" Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "default_screen" Monitor "Standardmonitor" Defaultdepth 24 EndSection
### TFT with max 1920x1200@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1920x1200" HorizSync 30-76 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1920x1200" Monitor "TFT_1920x1200" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1920x1200" "1920x1080" "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1920x1200
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1920x1200" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1920x1200" "1920x1080" "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1920x1080@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1920x1080" HorizSync 30-69 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1920x1080" Monitor "TFT_1920x1080" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1920x1080" "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1920x1080
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1920x1080" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1920x1080" "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1680x1050@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1680x1050" HorizSync 30-67 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1680x1050" Monitor "TFT_1680x1050" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1680x1050
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1680x1050" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1680x1050" "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 1600x1200@75Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "CRT_1600x1200" HorizSync 30-95 VertRefresh 50-75 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_1600x1200" Monitor "CRT_1600x1200" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1600x1200" "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1600x1200@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1600x1200" HorizSync 30-76 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1600x1200" Monitor "TFT_1600x1200" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1600x1200" "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1600x1200
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1600x1200" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1600x1200" "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1440x900@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1440x900" HorizSync 30-57 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1440x900" Monitor "TFT_1440x900" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1440x900
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1440x900" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1440x900" "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 1400x1050@75Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "CRT_1400x1050" HorizSync 30-83 VertRefresh 50-75 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_1400x1050" Monitor "CRT_1400x1050" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1400x1050@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1400x1050" HorizSync 30-67 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1400x1050" Monitor "TFT_1400x1050" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1400x1050
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1400x1050" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1400x1050" "1280x1024" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1366x768@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1366x768" HorizSync 30-49 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1366x768" Monitor "TFT_1366x768" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection

Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1366x768" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1366x768" "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 1280x1024@75Hz

Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_1280x1024" Monitor "CRT_1280x1024" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1280x1024" "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection

Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1280x1024" HorizSync 30-81 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1280x1024" Monitor "TFT_1280x1024" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1280x1024" "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1280x1024
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1280x1024" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1280x1024" "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1280x800@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1280x800x" HorizSync 30-81 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1280x800" Monitor "TFT_1280x800" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1280x800
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1280x800" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1280x800" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 1152x864@75Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "CRT_1152x864" HorizSync 30-69 VertRefresh 50-75 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_1152x864" Monitor "CRT_1152x864" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1152x864" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1152x864@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1152x864" HorizSync 30-81 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1152x864" Monitor "TFT_1152x864" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1152x864" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1152x864
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1152x864" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1152x864" "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 1024x768@75Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "CRT_1024x768" HorizSync 30-61 VertRefresh 50-75 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_1024x768" Monitor "CRT_1024x768" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1024x768@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1024x768" HorizSync 30-49 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1024x768" Monitor "TFT_1024x768" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1024x768
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1024x768" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1024x768" "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 1024x600@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_1024x600" HorizSync 30-39 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_1024x600" Monitor "TFT_1024x600" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 1024x600
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_1024x600" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "1024x600" "800x600" EndSubSection EndSection
### CRT with max 800x600@75Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "CRT_800x600" HorizSync 30-48 VertRefresh 50-75 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_CRT_800x600" Monitor "CRT_800x600" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x600" "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 800x600@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_800x600" HorizSync 30-39 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_800x600" Monitor "TFT_800x600" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x600" "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 800x600
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_800x600" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x600" "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### TFT with max 800x480@60Hz
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_800x480" HorizSync 30-38 VertRefresh 50-60 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_TFT_800x480" Monitor "TFT_800x480" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### Autodetect 800x480
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_AUTO_800x480" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### Settings for conf interface
Section "Monitor" Identifier "TFT_Xconfgui" HorizSync 28-36 VertRefresh 47-56 Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "Screen_Xconfgui" # Monitor "TFT_Xconfgui" Defaultdepth 24 SubSection "Display" Modes "800x600" "800x480" "640x480" EndSubSection EndSection
### Common settings
Section "InputDevice" Identifier "Generic Keyboard" Driver "kbd" Option "CoreKeyboard" Option "XkbRules" "xorg" Option "XkbModel" "pc105" Option "XkbOptions" "lv3:ralt_switch" EndSection
Section "InputDevice" Identifier "Configured Mouse" Driver "mouse" Option "CorePointer" Option "Device" "/dev/input/mice" Option "Protocol" "ImPS/2" Option "ZAxisMapping" "4 5" Option "Emulate3Buttons" "true" EndSection
Section "ServerLayout" Identifier "Default Layout" # Inputdevice "Generic Keyboard" # Inputdevice "Configured Mouse" Screen "default_screen" EndSection
Section "ServerFlags" Option "AutoAddDevices" "true" Option "AutoEnableDevices" "true" Option "AllowEmptyInput" "false" EndSection
Section "Module" EndSection

Section "Files" EndSection
### Default Monitor: autoprobe everything

Section "Files" EndSection
### Default Monitor: autoprobe everything
Section "Monitor" Identifier "Standardmonitor" Option "DPMS" EndSection
Section "Screen" Identifier "default_screen" Monitor "Standardmonitor" # Defaultdepth 24 EndSection
Section "InputDevice" Identifier "Generic Keyboard" Driver "kbd" Option "CoreKeyboard" Option "XkbRules" "xorg" Option "XkbModel" "pc105" Option "XkbOptions" "lv3:ralt_switch" EndSection
Section "InputDevice" Identifier "Configured Mouse" Driver "mouse" Option "CorePointer" Option "Device" "/dev/input/mice" Option "Protocol" "ImPS/2" Option "ZAxisMapping" "4 5" Option "Emulate3Buttons" "true" EndSection

Section "ServerFlags" Option "AutoAddDevices" "true" Option "AutoEnableDevices" "true" Option "AllowEmptyInput" "false" EndSection
Section "Module" EndSection
Section "Device" Identifier "Fbdev card" Driver "fbdev" EndSection
